Advances: 4 Improvement Points: 12 Improvement Points Allocation: Attribute: 6; Edge: 4; Skill: 2
Features
Edges (3 points): Arcane Background (Illusionist); Deadly Illusion; Master Of Illusion Hindrances: Big Mouth; Greedy; Grim; Loyal Human Features: Adaptable
Feature Notes:
Adaptable: +1 Edge Points
Big Mouth: Cannot keep secrets
Greedy: Demands more than a fair share
Loyal: Always takes risks for friends
Combat
Parry: 2 (0) Cover: 0 Toughness: 7 (1) Pace/Run: 6/+d6
Armor: Cloak With Hood Shield: None Weapons: Shuriken (d4+d4 R3"); Sickle (d4+d4); Unarmed (d4+d0)
Combat Notes:
Vigor Toughness Modifier: +4
Grim: Provoked (-2 to affect other opponents) by any successful Taunt; lasts until a Joker is drawn
Arcana
Power Count: 5 Power Points: 10
Common Power Modifiers: +1/+2/+3 PP Armor Piercing; +2 PP Fatigue; +1 PP Glow/Shroud; +2 PP Heavy Weapon; +1 PP Hinder/Hurry; +2 PP Lingering Damage; +1/+2 PP Dbl/Tpl Range; +1 PP Selective

Deadly Illusion: No cost to use Dead Power Modifier
